about_the_game:
This DLC contains a very early playable prototype of Road Redemption. It is very different from the version of Road Redemption available on Steam. It uses a completely different physics engine and has very different bike handling. You can also disarm enemies by deflecting their attacks. This is a fun variant of how Road Redemption once was and it really shows how much Road Redemption has changed throughout development.

This build is PC only and while it does work on almost all of our test machines, it is not compatible with every PC, especially laptops.
